org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream

类 IterativeStream<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStream<T>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.SingleOutputStreamOperator<T>
        • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.IterativeStream<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the elements in this Stream

    @PublicEvolving
public class IterativeStream<T>
extends SingleOutputStreamOperator<T>
    The iterative data stream represents the start of an iteration in a DataStream.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  IterativeStream.ConnectedIterativeStreams<I,F>
      The IterativeStream.ConnectedIterativeStreams represent a start of an iterative part of a streaming program, where the original input of the iteration and the feedback of the iteration are connected as in a ConnectedStreams.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStream

        environment, transformation

    • 方法详细资料

      • closeWith

        public DataStream<T> closeWith(DataStream<T> feedbackStream)
        Closes the iteration. This method defines the end of the iterative program part that will be fed back to the start of the iteration.

        A common usage pattern for streaming iterations is to use output splitting to send a part of the closing data stream to the head. Refer to DataStream.split(org.apache.flink.streaming.api.collector.selector.OutputSelector) for more information.

        参数:
        feedbackStream - DataStream that will be used as input to the iteration head.
        返回:
        The feedback stream.

      • withFeedbackType

        public <F> IterativeStream.ConnectedIterativeStreams<T,F> withFeedbackType(String feedbackTypeString)
        Changes the feedback type of the iteration and allows the user to apply co-transformations on the input and feedback stream, as in a ConnectedStreams.

        For type safety the user needs to define the feedback type

        参数:
        feedbackTypeString - String describing the type information of the feedback stream.
        返回:
        A IterativeStream.ConnectedIterativeStreams.

      • withFeedbackType

        public <F> IterativeStream.ConnectedIterativeStreams<T,F> withFeedbackType(Class<F> feedbackTypeClass)
        Changes the feedback type of the iteration and allows the user to apply co-transformations on the input and feedback stream, as in a ConnectedStreams.

        For type safety the user needs to define the feedback type

        参数:
        feedbackTypeClass - Class of the elements in the feedback stream.
        返回:
        A IterativeStream.ConnectedIterativeStreams.

      • withFeedbackType

        public <F> IterativeStream.ConnectedIterativeStreams<T,F> withFeedbackType(org.apache.flink.api.common.typeinfo.TypeInformation<F> feedbackType)
        Changes the feedback type of the iteration and allows the user to apply co-transformations on the input and feedback stream, as in a ConnectedStreams.

        For type safety the user needs to define the feedback type

        参数:
        feedbackType - The type information of the feedback stream.
        返回:
        A IterativeStream.ConnectedIterativeStreams.
